#### **Researcher** @ [MAPE](https://mape.org.br/) (IESP-UERJ)
MAPE is the Policy and Election Monitoring and Evaluation Laboratory. We are dedicated to studying public policies, elections, and their connections. Our goal is to improve academic production on the subject and to have a decisive impact on public debate. In particular, we combine different methodologies to study policies and elections, including causal inference techniques and machine learning.
